TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed InstanceEncodingOption extends System.Enum

summary.span: 包含選項，這個選項指出將狀態資訊儲存至持續性存放區前，指定持續性提供者是否應使用 Gzip 演算法，對執行個體狀態資訊進行編碼。

span.span: Contains options that specify whether the persistence provider should encode the instance state information using the GZip algorithm before saving the state information into the persistence store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[netfx40_long](~/includes/netfx40-long-md.md)] 會隨附於 SQL 持續性提供者，做為 SQL 工作流程執行個體存放區的構成部分，這是 類別的具體實作，可用來將狀態資訊保存至 SQL Server 資料庫。 ships with a SQL persistence provider as a constituent of the SQL Workflow Instance Store, which is a concrete implementation of the class and is used to persist state information in to the SQL Server database. 當`instanceEncodingOption`屬性設為 GZip與服務相關聯的服務行為，SQL 持續性提供者會使用 GZip 演算法編碼的執行個體狀態資訊的服務執行個體之前儲存狀態將 SQL Server 持續性資料庫的資訊。When the `instanceEncodingOption` attribute is set to GZip for the service behavior associated with a service, the SQL persistence provider uses the GZip algorithm to encode instance state information for the instance of the service before saving the state information into the SQL Server persistence database.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceEncodingOption GZip = int32(1)

summary.span: 指定使用 GZip 演算法壓縮執行個體資料。

span.span: Specifies that instance data is compressed using the GZip algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Activities.DurableInstancing.InstanceEncodingOption None = int32(0)

summary.span: 指定不壓縮執行個體資料。

span.span: Specifies that instance data is not compressed.
